ctx: intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce is_permutation to an evaluable reference.

original: intros A l0 l1 H1 x l2 l3 H2 H3. unfold is_permutation. intros a. apply (is_permutation_sind A _ _ l0 l1 H1). + apply (is_permutation_refl A _). + intros l l' H4 H5 y l4 H6. destruct (insertion_trans A _ _ _ H5 _ H6) as [l5 [H7 H8]]. apply (cons_is_permutation A l l' H4). apply (insertion_is_permutation A _ l5 a H8).
